file_content.text: Fight's on. We win this, the Republic's got my vote. Thanks again.
Jarrde. The control stations are deactivated. You're free to fly.
Already launched the speeders. With those defenses down, the Empire will never see us coming.
You really came through for us. Just hope the rest of the Republic follows. Thanks again.
What are you doing here? Those control stations are still active!
You want to help? Take down those defenses. Give us a chance.
I see. The Republic's got credits to recruit whole merc squads, but none left for Balmorra.
Oh, look, a Jedi. Like the Republic wasn't hoarding enough of their own resources.
And here comes Havoc Squad. Can't expect the Republic to give Balmorra her best.
Another mercenary. Do you scabs notice anything, or is the galaxy made of credits?
While the Republic's chasing after our best weapons, we're out here fighting to free Balmorra!
I'm no Republic officer, but I'm here to help.
So am I.
Well, I'm not about to refuse a Jedi Knight. If that's a serious offer, mind.
We need your weapons to defeat the Empire.
Look at the big picture.
Best in the galaxy. But you're gonna need people to build them, too.
Every man here's fighting to free Balmorra.
That's not true.
Not from what I've seen. But here's your chance to prove me wrong.
You won't change things with that attitude.
Just calm down.
Nothing's going to change unless we get help. My attitude included.
Who's "we"?
Go find a suggestion box.
Stop following orders and start doing what's right. We need your help.
Silas Jarrde. I'm in charge of the local resistance here. We're going to take back the Balmorran Arms Factory or die trying.
The Arms Factory is the most advanced facility on the planet. Whoever wins here wins it all. Can't be the Empire.
That's a big target for civilians to hit.
You're brave to try.
Never stopped us before. We'll do whatever's necessary to free Balmorra.
How do we win?
Use our inside knowledge to hit 'em where it hurts. Take control ourselves.
No kidding, genius.
Go ahead, make fun of me. Just do something to help while you're at it.
Problem is, the factory's got plenty of defenses. Biggest is the sensor array. We make a move, the Empire sees it.
Including any moves to bring it down.
Sounds dangerous.
And we've made plenty. Every man brave enough to try doesn't come back.
Any way to stop it?
That's your problem.
That's your problem.
We haven't got the men or the muscle. You've got skills to make up for both.
You'll need to take out each sensor individually, then shut down the backup generator. I've got the coordinates.
When the sensor array goes down, our scouts can get inside the factory and see what's left. If you're willing.
Count me in.
The Republic's nothing to you if I don't.
Not much choice.
Just volunteering's more than anyone else has done. Whatever the reason.
Once you're through, contact me on the maintenance hangar comm station. Then we'll know where we stand.
Not interested. [Refuse quest]
Same old song. Don't know why I bothered. Every Republic's the same.
Go back to your post, Republic. Balmorra's fighting the real war here.
You'll need to use communication scramblers to disable the sensors individually. I've got the coordinates.
